query:
ALTER TABLE performanceEvaluations 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS workflowStatus ENUM('pending_self', 'pending_manager', 'pending_consensus', 'completed') DEFAULT 'pending_self' NOT NULL AFTER status,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS selfCompletedAt DATETIME AFTER subordinatesEvaluationCompleted,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS managerCompletedAt DATETIME AFTER selfCompletedAt,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS consensusCompletedAt DATETIME AFTER managerCompletedAt;
